description:
"Transparencies"
From the serie "Mutations", I painted this work some time ago; it belongs to one of six parts that are exhibited together, but each one, in turn, works independently. The second that I mint of those six.
It is an image in which I work with a looser and less finished brushstroke than I usually do.

Oil on Canvas.
Dimensions: 2354 x 1883 px
Size: 30 x 24 cm.
